page.title: 18EVENTS
page.content: In most rural areas the annual fair is one of the highlights of the year.The Hexham area is no different. {HEXHAM TOWN FAIR During the week of the fair there are side shows,carnival floats,people in fancy dress and lots of activities for adults and children. {ACOMB FAIR The Parent Teachers Association at Acomb First School held a Summer Fair on Thursday June 20th.There were various kinds of stalls selling all kinds of things.The children of the school performed some Maypole dancing. Miss Patricia Emerson,the headmistress had taught the children how to do the dancing. It was a fine day and a lot of people attended.The money that was made will be used to buy the equipment that the school needs.
